name: Survivor
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: i5 2.0 ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeon 6850 / Intel HD 5000+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
